text:
Batik fails this test

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1">

  <style type="text/css">
    rect { fill: green !important; fill: red }
  </style>

  <rect id="test" fill="red" width="100" height="100" />

</svg>

ASV6 passes the test; !important declarations take precedence over unimportant 
ones, see http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS21/cascade.html#important-rules
creator: bjoern@hoehrmann.de
